title: User Registration and Onboarding for Companies
description: Verify the multi-step registration and onboarding flow for companies, including validation of all mandatory fields and successful completion.

steps.description: Navigate to company registration page.
Fill in required fields with valid company data.
Submit registration form.
Verify registration is successful and onboarding process starts.
Complete onboarding steps with required data inputs.
Verify onboarding completes with confirmation and access to company dashboard.

title: User Registration Error Handling - Missing Required Data
description: Check that the registration process returns appropriate validation errors when mandatory fields are missing or invalid.

steps.description: Navigate to company registration page.
Submit registration form without filling required fields.
Check validation errors are displayed for each missing mandatory field.

title: Login Success with Valid Credentials
description: Ensure users can login successfully using valid credentials with secure session handling.

steps.description: Navigate to login page.
Input correct username/email and password.
Click login button.
Verify login success and HttpOnly JWT cookie is set.

title: Login Failure with Invalid Credentials
description: Check the system correctly rejects login attempts with incorrect or missing credentials and shows error message.

steps.description: Navigate to login page.
Input invalid username/email and/or password.
Click login button.
Verify login failure with clear error message to user.

title: Dashboard Executive Data Accuracy and Display
description: Validate the executive dashboard displays up-to-date pipeline data, performance metrics, market analysis, and supports custom report generation.

steps.description: Login as authenticated user with access to dashboard.
Verify pipeline metrics and performance data are accurate and match backend data.
Check market analysis charts and data visualizations are rendered correctly.
Generate and customize reports from available options.
Confirm reports generate correctly with selected parameters.

title: Matchmaking Algorithm - Valid Investor-Company Matches
description: Ensure that the matchmaking system correctly generates relevant connections between investors and companies based on the compatibility score and filters.

steps.description: Login as investor user.
Apply advanced filters to search for investment opportunities.
Verify the matchmaking feed displays companies relevant to investor profile.
Check that each match has a valid compatibility score and recommendations.

title: Data Room Virtual - Document Upload, Access, and Versioning
description: Verify secure upload, access restrictions, version control and audit logging of documents in the virtual data room.

steps.description: Login as company user and access data room.
Upload multiple document types and versions.
Check documents upload is successful with correct metadata.
Set access controls restricting certain investors.
Verify investors cannot access documents outside of allowed permissions.
Modify document to create new version.
Confirm version history is maintained and audit logs capture changes.

title: CRM Pipeline Management - Add, Update, and Track Investor Relations
description: Ensure CRM correctly manages contacts, tracks pipeline stages, and sends automated notifications.

steps.description: Login as company user with CRM access.
Add new investor contact with full details.
Advance investor status through sales pipeline stages.
Verify pipeline stages update correctly and reflect in dashboard.
Check automated notifications triggered for changes.

title: Financial Analysis Tools - Model and Benchmark Accuracy
description: Confirm the financial modeling, valuation, risk analysis, and benchmarking tools operate correctly and produce reliable outputs.

steps.description: Access financial analysis tools logged in as authorized user.
Input sample financial data for modeling and valuation.
Verify model outputs and valuation calculations are consistent with expectations.
Run risk analysis and benchmarking comparisons.
Check analysis results reflect correct data and are displayed properly.

title: Payments and Compliance Integration with KYC/AML
description: Test full payment processing cycle including integration with Asaas gateway, KYC/AML checks, and contract execution.

steps.description: Login as investor user.
Initiate investment payment process.
Submit required KYC/AML documentation.
Verify KYC/AML validation succeeds or failure handled correctly.
Complete payment through Asaas gateway.
Confirm payment success and smart contract activation.

title: Authentication and Session Security - JWT and HttpOnly Cookies
description: Verify authentication workflow uses JWT with HttpOnly cookies, password hashing and secure session management.

steps.description: Attempt login with valid credentials.
Confirm JWT token is issued and HttpOnly cookie set.
Attempt to access protected API endpoints with and without token.
Verify access allowed only with valid token.
Validate password hashing on user creation and login.
Check password not stored or transmitted in plain text.

title: Investor Area - Dashboard, Statements, and Notifications
description: Validate investor account area features including investment portfolio display, statements, payments history, notifications and security settings.

steps.description: Login as investor user.
Confirm dashboard shows investments and performance data correctly.
Access statements and payments sections.
Verify statements and payment histories match transactions.
Check notifications panel for latest alerts.
Verify notifications are accurate and actionable.
Update security settings and verify changes.
Confirm successful update and effect on login session.

title: Company Area - Manage Investors, Offers and Reports
description: Check that companies can manage investor lists, create and update offers and generate reports as per requirements.

steps.description: Login as company user.
Navigate to investors management and add/update investor data.
Verify investor list reflects updates.
Create and configure new investment offer.
Confirm offer appears correctly and is accessible to investors.
Generate financial and investment reports.
Reports reflect correct data and export options work.

title: Search and Discovery - Personalized Investment Feed for Investors
description: Validate the personalized feed for investors shows relevant investment opportunities according to profile and preferences.

steps.description: Login as investor user.
Update profile and preferences for investment sectors and risk.
Verify investment feed updates accordingly with relevant opportunities.
Filter and search offers by criteria.
Confirm search results are accurate according to filters.

title: API Integration - REST Endpoints for Data Management
description: Test REST API endpoints for CRUD operations on accounts, investments, offers, portfolio and user data for correctness and error handling.

steps.description: Perform authenticated API calls for creating, reading, updating, and deleting resources.
Verify responses contain correct data and status codes.
Make API calls with invalid data or unauthorized tokens.
Confirm appropriate error codes and messages are returned.

title: External Service Integration - Email Notifications via Nodemailer
description: Confirm emails are sent correctly for key actions like registration, password recovery, notifications using Nodemailer integration.

steps.description: Trigger email related actions (registration confirmation, password reset, notification).
Check email sent with correct content and received in target inbox.
Simulate email service failure.
Verify system handles failure gracefully with retry or error reporting.

title: Responsive UI Verification - Multi-Device Support
description: Test UI responsiveness and functionality on desktop, tablet and mobile devices with different screen sizes.

steps.description: Access platform pages on desktop screen resolution.
Verify layout, navigation and content display correctly.
Repeat access on tablet and mobile screen resolutions.
Confirm responsive design adapts UI elements for each device properly.

title: Session Timeout and Logout Handling
description: Verify system correctly handles session expiration, logout workflows and user redirection for security.

steps.description: Login and remain idle until session timeout period elapses.
Verify user is logged out and redirected to login page.
Login again and perform manual logout.
Confirm session is cleared and access to protected pages is denied.

title: Error Handling for File Uploads in Data Room
description: Test file upload component's ability to handle large files, unsupported formats, network interruptions and provide user feedback.

steps.description: Attempt upload of valid file within allowed size and format.
Confirm successful upload and metadata registration.
Attempt upload of file exceeding size limits.
Verify error message displayed preventing upload.
Upload unsupported file formats.
Check validation error appears.
Simulate network interruption during upload.
Verify partial uploads fail gracefully with retry options.

title: System Uptime and Stability Monitoring
description: Verify the monitoring tools detect system outages or downtime and report uptime status above 99.9%.

steps.description: Simulate backend service downtime.
Confirm system monitoring logs the outage event accurately.
Check uptime report and alerting mechanisms.
Verify uptime reports reflect proper calculations and alerts sent.
